['Reduced  agility gain from 2.1 to 1.4.', "All of Chaos Knight's illusions within 600 radius around him now cast a fake  Chaos Bolt whenever Chaos Knight casts it.", ' Reality Rift

Now reduces armor by 2/3/4/5 for 6 seconds.

[?]', 'Reduced illusion damage dealt from 50%/75%/100% to 40%/70%/100%.', 'Increased illusion damage taken from 260% to 350%.', "Reworked  Aghanim's Scepter
Old: Allows  Phantasm to be cast on allies, creating illusions of them under Chaos Knight's control. Also reduces illusion damage taken from 260% to 180% and cooldown from 145 to 110.
New: Causes  Phantasm to create 1 illusion of all allied heroes on the map, and an extra illusion of Chaos Knight, all under his control. Allies are not interrupted, and not turned invulnerable.", "Old: Allows  Phantasm to be cast on allies, creating illusions of them under Chaos Knight's control. Also reduces illusion damage taken from 260% to 180% and cooldown from 145 to 110.", 'New: Causes  Phantasm to create 1 illusion of all allied heroes on the map, and an extra illusion of Chaos Knight, all under his control. Allies are not interrupted, and not turned invulnerable.']
